text: Jeanette Miller (born July 30, 1932) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as Aunt Edie on the ABC comedy series The Middle.The Middle - New sneak peek clip added! , October 18, 2009 She also appeared in Cold Heaven, The Truman Show, Norbit, Four Christmases, and Legion. Miller was born in Pensacola, Florida. Jeannette Miller Died On November 1, 2014 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1932 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Florida Category:People from Pensacola, Florida
title: Jeanette Miller
